summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing said Department to undertake a City gardening project for recreational and open space purposes; authorizing leases by the City from the United States Postal Service of certain property in the vicinity of Interlake Avenue North and North 46th Street, from Safeway Stores, Incorporated of certain property in the vicinity of 10th Avenue East and East Mercer street and from Mr. Rainie Picardo of certain property in the vicinity of 25th Avenue Northeast and Ravenna Boulevard for such gardening purposes; and making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
